pkgmetadata.longdescription: Finding Rhythmic and Non-Rhythmic Trends in Multi-Omics Data (MOSAIC) // Provides a function (mosaic_find()) designed to find rhythmic and non-rhythmic trends in multi-omics time course data using model selection and joint modeling, a method called MOSAIC (Multi-Omics Selection with Amplitude Independent Criteria). For more information, see H. De los Santos et al. (2020) doi:10.1101/2020.04.27.064147.
